Description: Marketing technology that works across email and website to personalise customer experiences, drive sales and increase customer loyalty.
Name: Pure360 - Rest

Methods.Name: Retrieve Event Notifications List
Methods.Description: Gets a list of event notifications.

Methods.Name: Update Event Notification
Methods.Description: Updates the event notifications with Process ID.

Methods.Name: Replace List With File Source
Methods.Description: Updates existing mailing list with file source.

Methods.Name: Replace List With Report Source
Methods.Description: Updates existing mailing list with report source.

Methods.Name: Remove List Contact
Methods.Description: Removes a contact from the list.

Methods.Name: Create List Uploads
Methods.Description: Uploads the records ready to add to list

Methods.Name: Create List Uploads (with outbound paging)
Methods.Description: Uploads the records ready to add to list

Methods.Name: Replace Contact
Methods.Description: Updates a contact.  To add fields to the list, use the field location of [lists].customfields.n where n is the desired column number.

Methods.Name: Create Contact
Methods.Description: Creates a contact.  To apply values to existing fields, use the field location of customfields.colnumber

Methods.Name: Retrieve Contacts By Mobile
Methods.Description: Gets a list of contacts with matching mobile.  Search is done by partial or Exact match.

Methods.Name: Retrieve Contacts By Email
Methods.Description: Gets a list of contacts with matching email.  Search is done by partial or Exact match.

Methods.Name: Retrieve Newsletter (Non-Customer) Contact List
Methods.Description: Gets a list of contacts who are not customers, simply newsletter subscribers.

Methods.Name: Retrieve Contacts
Methods.Description: Gets a list of contacts with matching email and/or mobile.
